name: amazon-fba-cashflow
description: Amazon FBA Cashflow planning with Supabase shared workspace (V2) and Vercel runtime config

scripts.test:parity:migration: npm run test:parity:migration:build && npm run test:parity:migration:run
scripts.test:parity:payments: npm run test:parity:migration:build && npm run test:parity:payments:run
scripts.test:parity:pofo: npm run test:parity:migration:build && npm run test:parity:pofo:run
scripts.test:parity:dashboard: npm run test:parity:migration:build && npm run test:parity:dashboard:run
scripts.test:parity:performance: npm run test:parity:migration:build && npm run test:parity:performance:run
scripts.test:parity:responsive: npm run test:parity:migration:build && npm run test:parity:responsive:run
scripts.test:parity:sync: npm run test:parity:migration:build && npm run test:parity:sync:run
scripts.test:parity:v2: npm run test:parity:migration:build && npm run test:parity:migration:run && npm run test:parity:sync:run && npm run test:parity:payments:run && npm run test:parity:pofo:run && npm run test:parity:dashboard:run && npm run test:parity:performance:run && npm run test:parity:responsive:run && npm run test:parity:routes:run
scripts.test:parity: node --test src/domain/parity.golden.test.js src/domain/cashflow.fixcost.test.js src/domain/cashInRules.test.js src/domain/inventoryProjection.test.js src/domain/outflowStack.test.js src/domain/vatPreview.test.js src/domain/foSuggestion.test.js src/domain/accountantReport.test.js && npm run test:parity:v2
scripts.test:preflight:quick: npm run test:parity:routes:run && npm run test:parity:pofo:run
scripts.test:preflight: npm run build && npm run test:parity
